m_szDocTitle: Patent US20120058398 - PAN-PEO Gels with Improved Conductance and Solvent Retention - Google Patents
m_szDocSumamry: PAN-PEO Gels with Improved Conductance and Solvent Retention US 20120058398 A1 Abstract Disclosed are gel electrolytes comprising a polymer, which is polyacrylonitrile (PAN) and polyethylene oxide (PEO); a lithium salt; and a solvent, which is a carbonate solvent, a lactone solvent, or mixtures thereof. Images(2) 1. A gel electrolyte comprising: a polymer in about 18 to about 22 wt %; a lithium salt in about 6 to about 8 wt %; and a solvent comprising a carbonate solvent, a lactone solvent, or a mixture thereof; wherein the polymer consists essentially of polyacrylonitrile (PAN) and polyethyle
